text: Thanks Jubam the project I sent you is about the 68 indigenous languages that exist in Mexico. It is like an effort to try to save some of them and toshow them to the new generations in order to appreciate our ancient cultures better. So there will be 68 short films, right now they are doing the 30th. I did a language called Kiliwa, it is from a small indigenous comunity on the north of the country.
As soon as I finishi the film I can send it to you :slightly_smiling_face:
Juba, I was wondering. Do you take commissions at the moment? If so, do you model your own 3D characters and do the rigging? or you rather only focus on the animation bit?
